my car is pink.

participant_2.background:
I would love to learn how to play the guitar like the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.

content.text: Hi, I am [user 1's name].
Hi, I am [user 2's name].
What do you do for a living?
I am a welder and I love it. I get to be creative everyday and make new friends.
That sounds fun. I am a swimmer and I love how it has helped me stay healthy and active.
That's great! I would love to be able to swim. I have always loved the water.
I hope you get to try it someday. What's your favorite thing about your family?
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday. They are also very loving and always there for me.
I am glad to hear that. My family is also very supportive and loving. They are the most important people in my life.
It sounds like you have a great family. I am happy for you.
Thank you. I am too.
What are your hobbies?
I enjoy making things for my family and acting out my characters with my friends.
That sounds like fun. I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
That's a great way to spend time with your children.
It is. I love being able to read to them and see their imaginations come to life.
I'm sure they love it too.
They do.
What are your goals?
I want to sell my paintings to make money and I would love to learn how to play the guitar like the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
That's awesome. I hope you achieve your goals. I want to get my own place and start a family.
That sounds great. I am sure you will achieve your goals.
Thank you. I hope you achieve yours as well.
